citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data and Information Service (NESDIS), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC)
citeinfo.title: High Resolution Seismic Reflection Data Beaufort and Chukchi Seas-Alaskan OCS USGS Open File Reports 82-33 & 81-34

descript.abstract: Approximately 9,384-line km of single-channel high- resolution Uniboom continuous seismic reflection profiles along 88 tracklines in the Beaufort and Chukchi Seas are now available for purchase from the National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC). The data were collected by the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) during two cruises of the R/V SAMUEL P. LEE in August 25 through October 5, 1977, and August 22 through September 19, 1978.*
descript.purpose: A report on the HIGH-RESOLUTION SEISMIC REFLECTION DATA Beaufort and Chukchi Seas-Alaskan OCS USGS Open File Reports 82-33 & 81-34

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
